about_the_game:
***The game doesn't have any gameplay, it's more like an animated player.***

This is a little game to experience living with a cat maid. You can have some sweet interactions with the cat maid,
such as touching your head... or bullying her.
You can perform three types of sexual intercourse at any time, and there are 6 kinds of animation differences for each sexual intercourse animation.
After many interactions, the cat maid will also have some emotional changes, and her reaction will be slightly different.
This is a small game, maybe the end of the process can be completed within 5 minutes.
But this game is not over, so you can interact with the female cat maid whenever you want.


CV: Chiroru Ohyama
Artwork: Milk Shake

content_descriptors.notes: This game has sexual behavior or sexual assault, and all depicted game characters are over 18 years old.

About the Game

***The game doesn't have any gameplay, it's more like an animated player.***

This is a little game to experience living with a cat maid. You can have some sweet interactions with the cat maid,

You can perform three types of sexual intercourse at any time, and there are 6 kinds of animation differences for each sexual intercourse animation.
After many interactions, the cat maid will also have some emotional changes, and her reaction will be slightly different.
This is a small game, maybe the end of the process can be completed within 5 minutes.
But this game is not over, so you can interact with the female cat maid whenever you want.
